issue.title: array::iterator and array::const_iterator should be literal types

discussion.p: Force the literal type requirement for the iterator and const_iterator in the std::array so that iterators of std::array could be used in constexpr functions.
Proposed change: Add to the end of the [array.overview] section: iterator and const_iterator shall be literal types.
I used the formulation "are literal types", rather than "shall be", since that denotes a requirement on the user.

blockquote.p: This wording is relative to N4640.

li.p: Add a new paragraph at the end of :

blockquote.ins: -?- iterator and const_iterator are literal types.

discussion.p: Wording tweaks suggested by LWG applied.
